name: Hand's Sight
text: By manifesting an eerie, spiritual eye of its own, your possessed hand can “see” on your behalf.
benefit: While your possessed hand isn’t carrying anything, you gain darkvision with a range of 60 feet and cannot be flanked.
text_zh: 透过显现出一只怪异恐怖的精魄之眼，你的鬼手能替你「看」东西。
benefit_zh: 当你的鬼手没持有任何东西时，你获得黑暗视觉60尺并不能被夹击。
